backend/main.mo: Defines authorization, user profiles, and extensive client data models with comparison helpers and follow-up logic.
feature_evidence.json: Records feature evidence linking a manual follow-up action feature to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short summaries of key frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light and dark mode color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling authentication flow, profile setup, routing, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginGate.t: Login screen using Internet Identity with branding and onboarding feature hints.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog to create the user profile with name input and backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/clients/Activate: Dialog for activating a client plan with start date and follow‑up day selection and validation.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientSt: Renders a status badge for a client based on status type or onboarding state.
frontend/src/components/clients/FollowUp: Dialog allowing users to record whether a follow-up is done and add optional notes.
Displays follow‑up status, history, and an optional action to mark follow-ups as done.
frontend/src/components/clients/PauseCli: Dialog for pausing a client’s plan with validation for duration and reason inputs.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with navigation, user menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/progress/Progres: Shows weight and body measurement trends over time using Recharts line charts.
Form for submitting new client progress measurements with validation and mutation handling.
Renders a sortable progress history table with trend icons and formatted measurement values.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and maintaining stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user, client, and onboarding data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRouter.ts: Implements simple hash-based routing with navigation and client code extraction.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query and identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ClientProfilePage.tsx: Displays a client’s profile, progress, status controls, and follow-up prompts using various data and action hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsListPage.tsx: Client list page with filtering, searching, and status/onboarding-based categorization.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing client metrics and follow‑up lists filtered by selected day.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardClientPage.tsx: Form page for creating new clients with onboarding state, plan duration, and validation.
frontend/src/utils/clientCode.ts: Utilities for formatting and matching client codes with normalization.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Maps backend errors to concise, user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/followUp.ts: Helpers for determining follow‑up scheduling, status, and latest entries.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Functions to format timestamps into human-readable dates and datetimes.
frontend/src/utils/plan.ts: Utilities to compute plan durations, end dates, and date input formatting.
frontend/src/utils/status.ts: Client status utilities including activation checks, display status, and metrics.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides functions to read URL params (including hash routing) and persist them via sessionStorage, plus helpers to clear stored or hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including schema version, existing features, and pending feature requests for build planning.
